extension.name: Editor - RokPad
extension.author: RocketTheme, LLC
extension.description: This loads an advanced text editor for developers with highlight, search & replace, lines counter, auto indent, multi-language and much more

field.name: rokpad-tidylevel
field.label: DocType Spec
field.description: HTML/XHTML document type specification level for the html tidy and tag transformaiton

field.name: rokpad-show-formatter
field.label: Text Formatting Bar
field.description: Show/Hide the Text Formatting Bar which contains predefined and custom text formatting shortcuts

field.name: rokpad-height
field.label: Initial Editor Height (px.)
field.description: The initial height of the editor frame, given as pixels.

field.name: rokpad-passdelay
field.label: Coloring Pass Delay (ms.)
field.description: Gives the amount of milliseconds between coloring passes.

field.name: rokpad-passtime
field.label: Pass Time (ms.)
field.description: Specifies the maximum amount of time that the highlighter will spend in one shot. Setting this too high will cause the editor to 'freeze' the browser for noticeable intervals.

field.name: rokpad-linenumberdelay
field.label: Line Number Delay (ms.)
field.description: When both line numbers are and text wrapping are turned on, updating line numbers can be expensive. These settings can be used to control how fast the updating happens ― they work in the same way as Coloring Pass Delay and Pass Time.

field.name: rokpad-linenumbertime
field.label: Line Number Time (ms.)
field.description: When both line numbers are and text wrapping are turned on, updating line numbers can be expensive. These settings can be used to control how fast the updating happens ― they work in the same way as Coloring Pass Delay and Pass Time.

field.name: rokpad-continuous
field.label: Continuous Scan (ms.)
field.description: Configure continuous scanning of the document. When 0, scanning is disabled. When set to a number, say N, a 'background' process will scan the document for passTime (see above) milliseconds every N milliseconds, regardless of whether anything changed. This makes sure non-local changes propagate through the document, and will help keep everything consistent. It does add extra processing cost, even for an idle editor.

field.name: rokpad-matchparens
field.label: Auto Match Parens
field.description: When ON, will cause parens to be matched every time a key is pressed or the user clicks on the document. Might be expensive for big documents

field.name: rokpad-history
field.label: History Depth
field.description: Maximum length of the undo history.

field.name: rokpad-history-delay
field.label: History Delay (ms.)
field.description: When nothing is done in the editor for this amount of milliseconds, pending changes get added to the undo history. Setting this lower will give the undo functionality a finer granularity.

field.name: rokpad-lineHandler
field.label: Lines Number
field.description: Show line numbers to the left of the editor.

field.name: rokpad-textwrapperHandler
field.label: Text Wrapper
field.description: Enables text-wrapping in the editor frame.

field.name: rokpad-indentunit
field.label: Indent Unit (int.)
field.description: An integer that specifies the amount of spaces one 'level' of indentation should add.

field.name: rokpad-tabmode
field.label: Tab Mode
field.description: Determines what the effect of pressing tab is.

field.name: rokpad-loadindent
field.label: Reindent On Load
field.description: When enabled, this causes the content of the editor to be reindented immediately when the editor loads.
